  1. from django.db import models
  4. class Notification(models.Model):
  5. name = models.CharField(max_length=200, unique=True)
  6. success = models.TextField(blank=True)
  7. fail = models.TextField(blank=True)
  8. commit_user = models.CharField('Commit User', max_length=50, blank=True)
  9. deploy_user = models.CharField('Deploy User', max_length=50, blank=True)
  10. created = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True)
  11. updated = models.DateTimeField(auto_now=True)
  13. def __unicode__(self):
  14. return self.name
  16. def get_email_list(self):
  17. emails = dict()
  19. for email in self.get_success():
  20. emails[email] = dict()
  21. emails[email]['success'] = True
  23. for email in self.get_fail():
  24. try:
  25. emails[email]['fail'] = True
  26. except KeyError, e:
  27. emails[email] = dict()
  28. emails[email]['fail'] = True
  30. return emails
  32. def get_success(self):
  33. return filter(None, self.success.split(','))
  35. def get_fail(self):
  36. return filter(None, self.fail.split(','))
  38. def commit_user_success(self):
  39. return True if '0' in self.commit_user else False
  41. def commit_user_fail(self):
  42. return True if '1' in self.commit_user else False
  44. def deploy_user_success(self):
  45. return True if '0' in self.deploy_user else False
  47. def deploy_user_fail(self):
  48. return True if '1' in self.deploy_user else False
  50. class Meta:
  51. ordering = ('name',)
  52. app_label = 'ftp_deploy'
  53. db_table = 'ftp_deploy_notification'
